(Now yahoo is acting up. I got the worst luck.)

Megatron/Terrorsaur:





Megatron looked at Time Bomb. "At least you are a loyal follower." He walked 
past him.



Terrorsaur surfaced out of the CR tank, with her platform under him lifting 
him up. He stood up, briefly looking around the section. From the looks of 
things, Megatron's side was unsuccessful. He took flight to where the others 
were, waiting to hear the news.
